name: customer-delight-management-area
description:
You're in the dead-zone of Customer Delight between the glass wall and 'Jellyfish'.
There's a vacuum where the CEO and PA's used to sit although it's adequately filled by the presence of Jim Dobbins when he's around.

inventory.name: map
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's a crude map showing all three internal floors of the office and the locations of each meeting room.
You might want to download the picture for this one and take a good look.

attributes.defaultResult: You can't tell which way is North on here but it might still be useful.
